message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SD 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on neural language modeling for speech recognition. 
- cs.SD (Sound) is also likely as the paper deals with speech recognition. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of LSTM and Transformer language models. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is relevant as the paper explores the ability of language models to carry over context across sentence boundaries. 
- cs.SD (Signal Processing) is less likely but still possible as the paper deals with speech recognition experiments.
